author: LegoDude80010
title: Cool Speedor Track
review:
Box/Instructions

There are no instructions to this set. The packaging is just a plastic wrapping with a piece of tape.

Parts

It comes with a Speedor ramp, a sticker sheet, and piece of decorated cardboard.

Minifigures

This set contains no minifigures.

The build

There is no build to it

The completed model

The ramp is nice for stop motion movies or good for playing with your LEGO vehicles.

Overall opinion

I love the ramp. It's fun to use for playing. I use the card board pieces a play mat for my chima characters.
